comprehensive_overview: Popscle is a computational tool for inferring population-scaled copy number variants and somatic single nucleotide variants from bulk DNA sequencing data. It offers capabilities to analyze data from diverse tumor types and platforms, providing insights into tumor heterogeneity and clonal evolution.
core_features:
1. Inferring population-scaled copy number variants
2. Detecting somatic single nucleotide variants
3. Analyzing data from different tumor types
4. Studying tumor heterogeneity and clonal evolution
